report_description: Comprehensive analysis of user engagement patterns, activity levels, and platform adoption metrics for system optimization and user experience improvement
data_returned: User activity statistics, engagement trends, login patterns, role-based usage analysis, and user retention metrics
use_cases: Platform usage optimization, user training needs assessment, system capacity planning, user experience enhancement, role-based feature development
filters: user_status_id IN (1,2) -- Active or inactive status
user_role_id NOT IN (6) -- Exclude read-only users
example_sql: SELECT ur.code as user_role, COUNT(*) as user_count, AVG(total_logins) as avg_logins, AVG(total_actions) as avg_actions, AVG(engagement_score) as avg_engagement FROM USR.V_USER_METRICS vm JOIN user_roles ur ON vm.user_role_id = ur.id WHERE vm.is_active = 1 AND vm.last_login_date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30 GROUP BY ur.code ORDER BY avg_engagement DESC
